Articles.Content: A happy St. David's Day to all the Welsh and Welsh-descended out there!   In the US, it's almost completely ignored, probably due to the proximity of the much-more-famous St. Patrick's Day, but there are a few of us who wear the leek...

Honestly never heard of it before now.

But I generally ignore holidays, except Pi day.
Oh, planning to celebrate that one too!   Mmmm.... pie...
